name: Grace Peter Charitable Trust

address: Narmadha Nadhi 4th street, Mahatma Gandhi Nagar

briefDescription: Grace Peter Charitable Trust is a not-for-profit and non-religious voluntary organization established by a team of committed individuals having the same vision of serving the society. The trust is running successfully for 11 years in its path of development intervention for the poor and needy from rural and urban areas and Environmental and Climate Change activities Madurai district. So far, 13401 target members have benefited by our Trust activities.  Six full time staffs and five part-time staffs are working in our Trust.                 Grace Peter Charitable Trust is a member of the following Organizations1.	Creditability Alliance, India2.	World Health Organization3.	United Nations Civil Society/Eco-Soc 4.	Give India, India5.	Global Giving, U.S.A.6.	Swim International, U.S.A. 7.	Peace Trust, India
